author: aadamchik
msg: CAY-1663 @CacheGroups annotation should allow an empty list of cache groups

author: stsp
msg: Make the svn_repos_hooks_setenv() API expect an apr_hash_t instead of an
array of C strings. This makes it easier for callers to use this API.
The conversion to an array of C strings is now performed by libsvn_repos.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/repos.c
(env_from_env_hash): Moved to libsvn_repos/hooks.c.
(get_resource): Pass the plain APR hash to svn_repos_hooks_setenv().
* subversion/include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_hooks_setenv): Update declaration.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/hooks.c
(env_from_env_hash): Moved here from mod_dav_svn/repos.c.
(run_hook_cmd): Convert the hooks_env APR hash table to an array of
C strings during the call to svn_io_start_cmd3().
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.c
(svn_repos_hooks_setenv): Switch hooks_env parameter type to apr_hash_t.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.h
(svn_repos_t): Change hooks_env field to apr_hash_t.

author: antelder
msg: remove excludes for tests that have been fixed

msg: Update for expected err msgs with the new extra exception information

msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3695 - ensure destination deletion removes entry in the acks table
